common_tests.name: WBC
common_tests.description: White Blood Cell count, an indicator of immune status.

common_tests.name: White Blood Cell
common_tests.description: Alternate label for WBC count.

common_tests.name: RBC
common_tests.description: Red Blood Cell count, essential for oxygen transport.

common_tests.name: Red Blood Cell
common_tests.description: Alternate label for RBC count.

common_tests.name: Platelet Count
common_tests.description: Measures the number of platelets, critical for clotting.

common_tests.name: Hemoglobin
common_tests.description: Indicates the blood's oxygen-carrying capacity; used to diagnose anemia.

common_tests.name: Hematocrit
common_tests.description: The percentage of blood volume occupied by red blood cells.

common_tests.name: MCV
common_tests.description: Mean Corpuscular Volume; average size of red blood cells.

common_tests.name: MCH
common_tests.description: Mean Corpuscular Hemoglobin; average amount of hemoglobin per red blood cell.

common_tests.name: MCHC
common_tests.description: Mean Corpuscular Hemoglobin Concentration; concentration of hemoglobin in red blood cells.

common_tests.name: CBC
common_tests.description: Complete Blood Count; includes WBC, RBC, hemoglobin, hematocrit, and platelets.

common_tests.name: ESR
common_tests.description: Erythrocyte Sedimentation Rate; a marker of inflammation.

common_tests.name: CRP
common_tests.description: C-reactive protein; a marker for acute inflammation.

common_tests.name: C-reactive protein
common_tests.description: Alternate label for CRP.

common_tests.name: Glucose
common_tests.description: Measures blood sugar levels.

common_tests.name: Fasting Blood Sugar
common_tests.description: Measures blood glucose after a period of fasting.

common_tests.name: Blood Sugar
common_tests.description: General measurement of blood sugar levels.

common_tests.name: HbA1c
common_tests.description: Glycated hemoglobin; indicates average blood glucose over 2–3 months.

common_tests.name: Hemoglobin A1c
common_tests.description: Alternate label for HbA1c.

common_tests.name: Glucose Tolerance
common_tests.description: Evaluates the body's ability to metabolize glucose.

common_tests.name: Lipid Panel
common_tests.description: Measures cholesterol, LDL, HDL, and triglycerides to assess cardiovascular risk.

common_tests.name: Cholesterol
common_tests.description: Total cholesterol measurement.

common_tests.name: LDL
common_tests.description: Low-Density Lipoprotein; often considered 'bad' cholesterol.

common_tests.name: HDL
common_tests.description: High-Density Lipoprotein; often considered 'good' cholesterol.

common_tests.name: Triglycerides
common_tests.description: Measures the level of triglycerides in the blood.

common_tests.name: Liver Function Panel
common_tests.description: A collection of tests (ALT, AST, ALP, GGT, bilirubin, albumin) to assess liver health.

common_tests.name: ALT
common_tests.description: Alanine transaminase; indicates liver cell injury.

common_tests.name: AST
common_tests.description: Aspartate transaminase; used to evaluate liver function.

common_tests.name: ALP
common_tests.description: Alkaline phosphatase; enzyme involved in liver and bone health.

common_tests.name: GGT
common_tests.description: Gamma-glutamyl transferase; elevated in bile duct disease.

common_tests.name: Bilirubin
common_tests.description: Measures bilirubin, a breakdown product of hemoglobin.

common_tests.name: Albumin
common_tests.description: A liver-produced protein, reflecting nutritional and liver function.

common_tests.name: Globulin
common_tests.description: Group of proteins in the blood involved in immune function.

common_tests.name: A/G Ratio
common_tests.description: Albumin-to-globulin ratio; used to evaluate liver and kidney function.

common_tests.name: BUN
common_tests.description: Blood Urea Nitrogen; marker for kidney function.

common_tests.name: Creatinine
common_tests.description: Waste product used to assess kidney function.

common_tests.name: eGFR
common_tests.description: Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate; indicator of kidney function.

common_tests.name: Renal Panel
common_tests.description: A group of tests to evaluate kidney health, including electrolytes, BUN, and creatinine.

common_tests.name: Electrolyte Panel
common_tests.description: Measures sodium, potassium, chloride, and bicarbonate.

common_tests.name: Sodium
common_tests.description: Measurement of blood sodium levels.

common_tests.name: Potassium
common_tests.description: Measurement of blood potassium levels.

common_tests.name: Chloride
common_tests.description: Measurement of blood chloride levels.

common_tests.name: Bicarbonate
common_tests.description: Measurement of bicarbonate in the blood; reflects acid-base balance.

common_tests.name: Calcium
common_tests.description: Measurement of blood calcium; important for bones and muscles.

common_tests.name: Phosphate
common_tests.description: Measurement of blood phosphate levels.

common_tests.name: Magnesium
common_tests.description: Measurement of blood magnesium levels.

common_tests.name: Thyroid Panel
common_tests.description: A set of tests (TSH, T3, T4) to assess thyroid function.

common_tests.name: TSH
common_tests.description: Thyroid-stimulating hormone; key for thyroid function.

common_tests.name: T3
common_tests.description: Triiodothyronine; a thyroid hormone.

common_tests.name: T4
common_tests.description: Thyroxine; the primary hormone produced by the thyroid.

common_tests.name: TPO Antibody
common_tests.description: Tests for thyroid peroxidase antibodies; helps diagnose autoimmune thyroid disease.

common_tests.name: Thyroglobulin Antibody
common_tests.description: Tests for antibodies against thyroglobulin.

common_tests.name: Vitamin D
common_tests.description: Measures the level of Vitamin D in the blood.

common_tests.name: Vitamin B12
common_tests.description: Measures the level of Vitamin B12.

common_tests.name: Folate
common_tests.description: Measures folate (Vitamin B9) levels.

common_tests.name: Folic Acid
common_tests.description: Alternate name for folate.

common_tests.name: Vitamin K
common_tests.description: Important for blood clotting; measured in some cases.

common_tests.name: Vitamin C
common_tests.description: Measures Vitamin C levels.

common_tests.name: Iron Panel
common_tests.description: Includes serum iron, ferritin, and TIBC to assess iron status.

common_tests.name: Ferritin
common_tests.description: Indicates the amount of stored iron in the body.

common_tests.name: TIBC
common_tests.description: Total Iron Binding Capacity; reflects the blood's capacity to bind iron.

common_tests.name: Transferrin
common_tests.description: A protein that transports iron in the blood.

common_tests.name: Transferrin Saturation
common_tests.description: Percentage of transferrin saturated with iron.

common_tests.name: Rheumatoid Factor
common_tests.description: Antibody used in diagnosing rheumatoid arthritis.

common_tests.name: Anti-CCP
common_tests.description: Anti-cyclic citrullinated peptide antibody test; specific for rheumatoid arthritis.

common_tests.name: ANA
common_tests.description: Antinuclear antibody test for autoimmune disorders.

common_tests.name: Urinalysis
common_tests.description: Examines urine for cells, chemicals, and other substances.

common_tests.name: Urine Culture
common_tests.description: Detects bacteria in urine to diagnose infection.

common_tests.name: Stool Culture
common_tests.description: Detects pathogens in stool samples.

common_tests.name: Fecal Occult Blood Test
common_tests.description: Detects hidden blood in stool; used for cancer screening.

common_tests.name: FOBT
common_tests.description: Alternate term for Fecal Occult Blood Test.

common_tests.name: NS1
common_tests.description: Dengue NS1 antigen test.

common_tests.name: CT Scan
common_tests.description: Computed Tomography scan for cross-sectional imaging.

common_tests.name: MRI
common_tests.description: Magnetic Resonance Imaging for detailed soft-tissue imaging.

common_tests.name: PCR
common_tests.description: Polymerase Chain Reaction test to amplify and detect DNA.

common_tests.name: Antigen Test
common_tests.description: Detects specific antigens from pathogens.

common_tests.name: Antibody Test
common_tests.description: Detects antibodies, indicating previous exposure to a pathogen.

common_tests.name: ELISA
common_tests.description: Enzyme-Linked Immunosorbent Assay, a common immunoassay.

common_tests.name: Spirometry
common_tests.description: Assesses lung function by measuring airflow.

common_tests.name: Peak Flow
common_tests.description: Measures the maximum speed of expiration.

common_tests.name: Mantoux Test
common_tests.description: Tuberculin skin test to detect exposure to tuberculosis.

common_tests.name: Chest X-Ray
common_tests.description: Radiographic imaging of the chest.

common_tests.name: ECG
common_tests.description: Electrocardiogram to evaluate heart rhythm.

common_tests.name: Electrocardiogram
common_tests.description: Alternate label for ECG.

common_tests.name: Echocardiogram
common_tests.description: Ultrasound imaging of the heart.

common_tests.name: Pulse Oximetry
common_tests.description: Measures oxygen saturation in the blood.

common_tests.name: Oxygen Saturation
common_tests.description: Percentage of oxygen in the blood.

common_tests.name: SpO2
common_tests.description: Alternate label for oxygen saturation.

common_tests.name: Procalcitonin
common_tests.description: Biomarker for bacterial infections and sepsis.

common_tests.name: D-dimer
common_tests.description: Assesses blood clot formation and breakdown.

common_tests.name: Troponin
common_tests.description: Cardiac enzyme test used to diagnose heart attacks.

common_tests.name: CK-MB
common_tests.description: Creatine kinase-MB, a marker for cardiac damage.

common_tests.name: NT-proBNP
common_tests.description: N-terminal pro B-type natriuretic peptide; used to diagnose heart failure.

common_tests.name: BNP
common_tests.description: B-type natriuretic peptide test for heart failure.

common_tests.name: Arterial Blood Gas
common_tests.description: Measures pH, oxygen, and carbon dioxide levels in blood.

common_tests.name: Blood Gas
common_tests.description: Alternate term for arterial blood gas analysis.

common_tests.name: Ultrasound
common_tests.description: Uses sound waves to produce images of internal organs.

common_tests.name: Endoscopy
common_tests.description: Procedure using a camera to examine the interior of the gastrointestinal tract.

common_tests.name: Colonoscopy
common_tests.description: Examination of the colon using a camera.

common_tests.name: Pap Smear
common_tests.description: Screening test for cervical cancer.

common_tests.name: HPV Test
common_tests.description: Test for Human Papillomavirus infection.

common_tests.name: Home Blood Pressure
common_tests.description: Measurement of blood pressure using a home monitor.

common_tests.name: Home Glucose
common_tests.description: Measurement of blood glucose using a home glucometer.

common_tests.name: COVID Test
common_tests.description: Test for COVID-19 infection.

common_tests.name: Rapid Test
common_tests.description: A quick diagnostic test for various conditions.

common_tests.name: SARS-CoV-2 Test
common_tests.description: Test for the virus causing COVID-19.

common_tests.name: Cortisol
common_tests.description: Measures cortisol levels to assess adrenal function and stress.

common_tests.name: ACTH
common_tests.description: Adrenocorticotropic hormone test.

common_tests.name: Aldosterone
common_tests.description: Hormone test used to evaluate adrenal function and blood pressure regulation.

common_tests.name: Renin
common_tests.description: Enzyme involved in blood pressure and electrolyte balance.

common_tests.name: Insulin
common_tests.description: Hormone that regulates blood glucose levels.

common_tests.name: C-Peptide
common_tests.description: Indicator of insulin production.

common_tests.name: Urine Protein
common_tests.description: Test for protein in the urine, which may indicate kidney damage.

common_tests.name: Microalbumin
common_tests.description: Detects small amounts of albumin in urine as an early marker of kidney damage.

common_tests.name: Urine Creatinine
common_tests.description: Measures creatinine in urine to assess kidney function.

common_tests.name: Coagulation Panel
common_tests.description: A group of tests including PT, aPTT, and fibrinogen to assess blood clotting.

common_tests.name: Prothrombin Time (PT)
common_tests.description: Measures the time it takes for blood to clot.

common_tests.name: Activated Partial Thromboplastin Time (aPTT)
common_tests.description: Assesses the intrinsic pathway of coagulation.

common_tests.name: Fibrinogen
common_tests.description: Measures the level of fibrinogen, a key clotting factor.

common_tests.name: Lactate
common_tests.description: Measures blood lactate levels, which may indicate tissue hypoxia.

common_tests.name: Vitamin A
common_tests.description: Measures Vitamin A levels, important for vision and immune function.

common_tests.name: Vitamin E
common_tests.description: Measures Vitamin E levels, an antioxidant.

common_tests.name: Copper
common_tests.description: Measures blood copper levels, important for enzymatic reactions.

common_tests.name: Zinc
common_tests.description: Measures blood zinc levels, essential for immune function and metabolism.

common_tests.name: Selenium
common_tests.description: Measures selenium, a trace element with antioxidant properties.

common_tests.name: Amylase
common_tests.description: Enzyme test used to evaluate pancreatic function.

common_tests.name: Lipase
common_tests.description: Enzyme test for pancreatic function, often used with amylase.

common_tests.name: Creatine Kinase (CK)
common_tests.description: Measures creatine kinase, an enzyme related to muscle damage.

common_tests.name: Myoglobin
common_tests.description: Measures myoglobin levels, which increase with muscle damage.

common_tests.name: LDH
common_tests.description: Lactate dehydrogenase; elevated levels may indicate tissue damage.

common_tests.name: Homocysteine
common_tests.description: An amino acid whose elevated levels are associated with cardiovascular risk.

common_tests.name: Cystatin C
common_tests.description: A sensitive marker of kidney function.

common_tests.name: Ceruloplasmin
common_tests.description: A copper-carrying protein; low levels may indicate Wilson's disease.

common_tests.name: Beta-2 Microglobulin
common_tests.description: May be elevated in multiple myeloma and kidney dysfunction.

common_tests.name: Serum Osmolality
common_tests.description: Assesses the concentration of solutes in the blood.

common_tests.name: Urine Osmolality
common_tests.description: Measures urine concentration; used to evaluate kidney function and hydration status.

common_tests.name: Uric Acid
common_tests.description: Used to assess risk for gout and evaluate kidney function.

common_tests.name: Lipoprotein(a)
common_tests.description: A lipoprotein linked with atherosclerosis risk.

common_tests.name: Apolipoprotein A1
common_tests.description: The main protein component of HDL cholesterol.

common_tests.name: Apolipoprotein B
common_tests.description: The primary protein in LDL cholesterol; used to assess cardiovascular risk.

common_tests.name: Growth Hormone
common_tests.description: Used to diagnose growth disorders and assess pituitary function.

common_tests.name: IGF-1
common_tests.description: Reflects growth hormone activity.

common_tests.name: Parathyroid Hormone (PTH)
common_tests.description: Regulates calcium and phosphate balance; used in evaluating parathyroid function.

common_tests.name: Calcitonin
common_tests.description: Helps regulate calcium levels; may be used in thyroid cancer screening.

common_tests.name: Vitamin B1 (Thiamine)
common_tests.description: Essential for carbohydrate metabolism; deficiency leads to beriberi.

common_tests.name: Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine)
common_tests.description: Involved in amino acid metabolism and neurotransmitter synthesis.

common_tests.name: Vitamin B2 (Riboflavin)
common_tests.description: Important for energy production and cellular function.

common_tests.name: Vitamin B3 (Niacin)
common_tests.description: Involved in metabolism and DNA repair.

common_tests.name: Vitamin B5 (Pantothenic Acid)
common_tests.description: Essential for synthesizing coenzyme A and energy metabolism.

common_tests.name: Vitamin B7 (Biotin)
common_tests.description: Important for skin, hair, and metabolic functions.

common_tests.name: Prostate Specific Antigen (PSA)
common_tests.description: A tumor marker used primarily for screening prostate cancer.

common_tests.name: Free PSA
common_tests.description: Measures the unbound fraction of PSA in the blood.

common_tests.name: CA 125
common_tests.description: A tumor marker used in ovarian cancer screening.

common_tests.name: CA 19-9
common_tests.description: A tumor marker used primarily for pancreatic cancer.

common_tests.name: CA 15-3
common_tests.description: A tumor marker used for breast cancer monitoring.

common_tests.name: Alpha-Fetoprotein (AFP)
common_tests.description: A tumor marker used in liver cancer and germ cell tumor screening.

common_tests.name: Beta-hCG
common_tests.description: Human chorionic gonadotropin; used in pregnancy tests and as a tumor marker.

common_tests.name: Carcinoembryonic Antigen (CEA)
common_tests.description: A tumor marker used in colorectal and other cancers.

common_tests.name: CA 27-29
common_tests.description: A tumor marker used in breast cancer monitoring.

common_tests.name: Serum Transferrin Receptor
common_tests.description: Assesses iron status and erythropoiesis.

common_tests.name: hs-CRP
common_tests.description: High sensitivity C-reactive protein, used for cardiovascular risk assessment.

common_tests.name: Serum IgG
common_tests.description: Measures the level of immunoglobulin G in the blood.

common_tests.name: Serum IgA
common_tests.description: Measures the level of immunoglobulin A in the blood.

common_tests.name: Serum IgM
common_tests.description: Measures the level of immunoglobulin M in the blood.

common_tests.name: Serum IgE
common_tests.description: Measures the level of immunoglobulin E, often associated with allergies.

common_tests.name: Complement C3
common_tests.description: A protein of the complement system, part of immune defense.

common_tests.name: Complement C4
common_tests.description: A protein of the complement system, part of immune defense.

common_tests.name: CH50
common_tests.description: Measures total hemolytic complement activity.

common_tests.name: Anti-dsDNA
common_tests.description: Antibody against double-stranded DNA, used in lupus diagnosis.

common_tests.name: Anti-Smith antibody
common_tests.description: A highly specific antibody for systemic lupus erythematosus.

common_tests.name: Anti-Ro/SSA antibody
common_tests.description: Associated with Sjögren's syndrome and lupus.

common_tests.name: Anti-La/SSB antibody
common_tests.description: Associated with Sjögren's syndrome.

common_tests.name: Anti-U1 RNP antibody
common_tests.description: Associated with mixed connective tissue disease.

common_tests.name: Anti-Jo-1 antibody
common_tests.description: Associated with polymyositis and dermatomyositis.

common_tests.name: Von Willebrand Factor Antigen
common_tests.description: Measures levels of von Willebrand factor for bleeding disorders.

common_tests.name: Factor VIII assay
common_tests.description: Measures the activity of clotting factor VIII.

common_tests.name: Fibrin Degradation Products (FDP)
common_tests.description: Indicates the breakdown of fibrin, used in clotting assessments.

common_tests.name: Lipoprotein-associated phospholipase A2 (Lp-PLA2)
common_tests.description: A marker associated with cardiovascular risk.

common_tests.name: 1,25-dihydroxyvitamin D
common_tests.description: The active form of vitamin D.

common_tests.name: Serum Free Light Chains (Kappa)
common_tests.description: Assesses plasma cell disorders.

common_tests.name: Serum Free Light Chains (Lambda)
common_tests.description: Assesses plasma cell disorders.

common_tests.name: Immunofixation Electrophoresis
common_tests.description: Used to detect monoclonal proteins in blood or urine.

common_tests.name: Soluble IL-2 Receptor
common_tests.description: A marker of T-cell activation.

common_tests.name: Serum Tryptase
common_tests.description: Used to assess mast cell activation.

common_tests.name: Urine Catecholamines
common_tests.description: Measures epinephrine, norepinephrine, and dopamine levels.

common_tests.name: 24-Hour Urine Metanephrines
common_tests.description: Used to diagnose pheochromocytoma.

common_tests.name: 24-Hour Urine Vanillylmandelic Acid (VMA)
common_tests.description: Used to diagnose pheochromocytoma.

common_tests.name: Neuron-Specific Enolase (NSE)
common_tests.description: A marker for neuroendocrine tumors.

common_tests.name: Fecal Calprotectin
common_tests.description: Assesses intestinal inflammation.

common_tests.name: Stool Elastase
common_tests.description: Evaluates exocrine pancreatic function.

common_tests.name: H. pylori Stool Antigen
common_tests.description: Detects Helicobacter pylori infection in stool.

common_tests.name: Serum Pepsinogen I
common_tests.description: Used in gastric cancer screening.

common_tests.name: Serum Pepsinogen II
common_tests.description: Used along with Pepsinogen I to assess gastric mucosal health.

common_tests.name: Anti-Parietal Cell Antibody
common_tests.description: Used in the evaluation of autoimmune gastritis.

common_tests.name: Intrinsic Factor Antibody
common_tests.description: Used to diagnose pernicious anemia.

common_tests.name: Serum Osteocalcin
common_tests.description: A marker of bone formation.

common_tests.name: Bone-specific Alkaline Phosphatase
common_tests.description: Indicates bone formation activity.

common_tests.name: Serum CTX (C-terminal Telopeptide)
common_tests.description: A marker of bone resorption.

common_tests.name: P1NP (Procollagen Type 1 N-Terminal Propeptide)
common_tests.description: A marker of bone formation.

common_tests.name: Plasma Renin Activity
common_tests.description: Assesses renin levels to evaluate kidney function and blood pressure regulation.

common_tests.name: Cortisol-Binding Globulin
common_tests.description: Binds cortisol; alterations can affect total cortisol measurements.

common_tests.name: Serum Free Cortisol
common_tests.description: Measures biologically active cortisol in the blood.

common_tests.name: Salivary Cortisol
common_tests.description: Non-invasive measure of cortisol levels.

common_tests.name: 24-Hour Urinary Free Cortisol
common_tests.description: Assesses cortisol secretion over a full day.

common_tests.name: DHEA-S (Dehydroepiandrosterone Sulfate)
common_tests.description: A marker of adrenal function.

common_tests.name: Total Testosterone
common_tests.description: Measures the total testosterone level in the blood.

common_tests.name: Free Testosterone
common_tests.description: Measures the unbound testosterone in the blood.

common_tests.name: Estradiol
common_tests.description: Primary estrogen; used in various hormonal assessments.

common_tests.name: Progesterone
common_tests.description: A key hormone in female reproduction.

common_tests.name: Luteinizing Hormone (LH)
common_tests.description: Regulates ovulation and testosterone production.

common_tests.name: Follicle-Stimulating Hormone (FSH)
common_tests.description: Regulates reproductive processes.

common_tests.name: Prolactin
common_tests.description: Hormone involved in lactation and reproductive health.

common_tests.name: Anti-Müllerian Hormone (AMH)
common_tests.description: Used to assess ovarian reserve.

common_tests.name: Chromogranin A
common_tests.description: A marker for neuroendocrine tumors.

common_tests.name: Serum IL-6
common_tests.description: A pro-inflammatory cytokine.

common_tests.name: Serum TNF-alpha
common_tests.description: A pro-inflammatory cytokine.

common_tests.name: Serum Interferon-gamma
common_tests.description: A cytokine important in immune responses.

common_tests.name: Serum Bile Acids
common_tests.description: Used to assess liver function and cholestasis.

common_tests.name: Apolipoprotein E
common_tests.description: Involved in lipid metabolism and linked with Alzheimer’s risk.

common_tests.name: Apolipoprotein C-III
common_tests.description: Involved in triglyceride metabolism.

common_tests.name: Urine 5-HIAA
common_tests.description: A metabolite of serotonin used in the evaluation of carcinoid syndrome.

common_tests.name: Serum Adiponectin
common_tests.description: A hormone involved in glucose regulation and fatty acid oxidation.

common_tests.name: Serum Leptin
common_tests.description: A hormone that regulates appetite and energy balance.

common_tests.name: Plasma Endothelin-1
common_tests.description: A potent vasoconstrictor; a marker for cardiovascular disease.

common_tests.name: Serum Osteopontin
common_tests.description: A glycoprotein associated with inflammation and cancer.

common_tests.name: Matrix Metalloproteinase-9 (MMP-9)
common_tests.description: An enzyme involved in tissue remodeling.

common_tests.name: Urine Albumin-to-Creatinine Ratio (ACR)
common_tests.description: Used to assess kidney damage.

common_tests.name: Soluble Urokinase Plasminogen Activator Receptor (suPAR)
common_tests.description: A marker of immune activation and inflammation.

common_tests.name: Plasma Copeptin
common_tests.description: A surrogate marker for vasopressin release.

common_tests.name: Vitamin D Binding Protein
common_tests.description: The main carrier protein for vitamin D in circulation.

common_tests.name: Granulocyte Colony-Stimulating Factor (G-CSF)
common_tests.description: Stimulates the production of white blood cells.

common_tests.name: Granulocyte-Macrophage Colony-Stimulating Factor (GM-CSF)
common_tests.description: Stimulates the production of white blood cells and macrophages.

common_tests.name: Adrenomedullin
common_tests.description: A peptide involved in vasodilation and cardiovascular regulation.

common_tests.name: Beta-Endorphin
common_tests.description: An endogenous opioid peptide.

common_tests.name: Calcitonin Gene-Related Peptide (CGRP)
common_tests.description: A peptide involved in vasodilation and pain transmission.

common_tests.name: Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor (VEGF)
common_tests.description: A protein that stimulates blood vessel formation.

common_tests.name: Soluble VEGF Receptor
common_tests.description: Binds VEGF and modulates its activity.

common_tests.name: Osteoprotegerin
common_tests.description: Regulates bone metabolism by inhibiting osteoclast differentiation.

common_tests.name: IgG Subclasses
common_tests.description: Measurement of IgG1, IgG2, IgG3, and IgG4 levels.

common_tests.name: Serum Soluble IL-6 Receptor
common_tests.description: The receptor for IL-6 in soluble form.

common_tests.name: Serum C-Reactive Protein High Sensitivity (hs-CRP)
common_tests.description: A more sensitive measurement of CRP for cardiovascular risk.

common_tests.name: Serum Interleukin-1 beta (IL-1β)
common_tests.description: A pro-inflammatory cytokine.

common_tests.name: Serum Interleukin-8 (IL-8)
common_tests.description: A cytokine involved in neutrophil activation.

common_tests.name: Serum Interleukin-10 (IL-10)
common_tests.description: An anti-inflammatory cytokine.

common_tests.name: Urine 24-Hour Protein
common_tests.description: Measures total protein excretion in urine over 24 hours.

common_tests.name: Urine Microalbumin-to-Creatinine Ratio
common_tests.description: Assesses kidney damage by measuring albumin relative to creatinine.

common_tests.name: Serum Myeloperoxidase (MPO)
common_tests.description: An enzyme involved in inflammation and oxidative stress.

common_tests.name: Serum Beta-D-Glucan
common_tests.description: A marker for invasive fungal infections.

common_tests.name: Serum Soluble CD163
common_tests.description: A marker of macrophage activation.

common_tests.name: Serum Soluble CD14
common_tests.description: A marker of monocyte activation.

common_tests.name: Parathyroid Hormone-related Protein
common_tests.description: Used in the evaluation of certain cancers and hypercalcemia.

common_tests.name: Serum Matrix Metalloproteinase-2 (MMP-2)
common_tests.description: Enzyme involved in tissue remodeling.

common_tests.name: Serum Matrix Metalloproteinase-3 (MMP-3)
common_tests.description: Enzyme involved in tissue remodeling and inflammation.

common_tests.name: Plasma Growth Differentiation Factor 15 (GDF-15)
common_tests.description: A marker associated with cellular stress and cardiovascular risk.

common_tests.name: Serum NT-proCNP
common_tests.description: N-terminal pro C-type natriuretic peptide; involved in bone metabolism.

common_tests.name: Serum Soluble CD40 Ligand
common_tests.description: A marker associated with immune activation and inflammation.

common_tests.name: Serum Soluble Fas Ligand
common_tests.description: A marker of cell apoptosis.

common_tests.name: Serum VCAM-1
common_tests.description: Vascular cell adhesion molecule-1; involved in leukocyte-endothelial adhesion.

common_tests.name: Serum ICAM-1
common_tests.description: Intercellular adhesion molecule-1; plays a role in inflammation.

common_tests.name: Serum E-selectin
common_tests.description: An adhesion molecule involved in endothelial activation.

common_tests.name: Serum P-selectin
common_tests.description: An adhesion molecule involved in platelet aggregation.

common_tests.name: Serum Matrix Metalloproteinase-7 (MMP-7)
common_tests.description: Enzyme involved in extracellular matrix remodeling.

common_tests.name: Serum Matrix Metalloproteinase-8 (MMP-8)
common_tests.description: Enzyme primarily released by neutrophils.

common_tests.name: Urinary N-telopeptide (NTX)
common_tests.description: Marker of bone resorption.

common_tests.name: 24-Hour Creatinine Clearance
common_tests.description: Measures kidney function by assessing creatinine clearance over 24 hours.

common_tests.name: Urine Beta-2 Microglobulin
common_tests.description: A marker of tubular kidney damage.

common_tests.name: Urine N-acetyl-beta-D-glucosaminidase (NAG)
common_tests.description: An enzyme indicating tubular damage in the kidneys.

common_tests.name: Serum Soluble CD30
common_tests.description: A marker associated with lymphocyte activation.

common_tests.name: Serum Soluble CD40
common_tests.description: A co-stimulatory protein involved in immune regulation.

common_tests.name: Serum Soluble Fas
common_tests.description: A marker of cell apoptosis regulation.

common_tests.name: Serum Soluble TNF Receptor 1 (sTNFR1)
common_tests.description: Reflects TNF-alpha activity.

common_tests.name: Serum Soluble TNF Receptor 2 (sTNFR2)
common_tests.description: Reflects TNF-alpha activity.

common_tests.name: Serum Homocitrulline
common_tests.description: A modified amino acid that may be linked to protein damage.

common_tests.name: Beta-hydroxybutyrate
common_tests.description: A ketone body used to assess ketosis and diabetic ketoacidosis.
